scripts.dev: bun --watch build.mjs & bun tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css --watch & bun build src/main.js src/pace-main.js src/riegel-main.js src/magic-mile-main.js --outdir dist --watch & bun live-server dist
scripts.build: bun tailwindcss -i src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css && bun build src/main.js src/pace-main.js src/riegel-main.js src/magic-mile-main.js --outdir dist --minify && bun run build.mjs
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun wrangler pages deploy dist
